title: The Power (CRS105)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode. A story that Tori Weston first shared on the podcast in August of 2014 about saving the life of a rapist.
Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Tori Weston, Kevin Allison)
